projectCategory: ICSE Class IX Java – Moderate Loop Projects

projects.title: Print First N Even Numbers
projects.description: Print the first N even numbers starting from 2.
projects.learningOutcome: Generate a number sequence using a loop.

projects.title: Print First N Odd Numbers
projects.description: Print the first N odd numbers.

projects.title: Series of Squares
projects.description: Print square of numbers from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
 System.out.print((i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Series of Cubes
projects.description: Print cube of numbers from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
 System.out.print((i*i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Fibonacci Series
projects.description: Generate Fibonacci series up to N terms.

projects.title: Sum of First N Even Numbers
projects.description: Find sum of first N even numbers.
projects.answer:
int sum=0;
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) sum+=2*i;

projects.title: Multiples of 7 Series
projects.answer: for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) System.out.print((7*i)+" ");

projects.title: Harmonic Series
projects.description: Calculate sum of harmonic series up to N terms.
projects.answer:
double sum=0;
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) sum+=1.0/i;

projects.title: Square Star Pattern
projects.description: Print square star pattern of size N.

projects.answer: for(int i=1;i<=n;i+=2) System.out.print((i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Series 1, 11, 111
projects.description: Generate series 1, 11, 111 up to N terms.
